name: Wicca (itch)
description:
Explore a world that seems frozen in time...

You come alive on an strange island that seems curse, it apparently shows traces of an ancient form of intelligence, now extinct.

Only your power can give life back to this beautiful place !

Wicca is a third-person exploration game, carried out as part of an end-of-year project by first-year students.

You have the power to restore life around you. Explore and resolve puzzles to try to understand what happened !

!!! The game is still in development !!!

You can download a demo version down here. Thanks for your feedbacks.
